  • All Superinterfaces:
    Observer<Update>
    All Known Implementing Classes:

extends Observer<Update>

      • showPositionSelectionView

        void showPositionSelectionView(java.util.Set<Position> possiblePositions)
        Ask player to select a position from the board
        Parameters:
        possiblePositions - possible selectable positions (any position selected from outside this range should be considered an input error by the controller)

      • showTargetsSelectionView

        void showTargetsSelectionView(int minToSelect,
                              int maxToSelect,
                              java.util.Set<PlayerColor> possibleTargets)
        Ask player to select a group of targets (represented through PlayerColor) from the board
        Parameters:
        minToSelect - minimum number of targets requested
        maxToSelect - maximum number of targets allowed
        possibleTargets - possible selectable targets (any target selected from outside this group should be considered an input error by the controller)

      • showEffectsSelectionView

        void showEffectsSelectionView(java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Set<Effect>> priorityMap,
                              java.util.Set<Effect> possibleEffects)
        Ask player to select a list of effects
        Parameters:
        priorityMap - The possible effects that the player can choose from. The effects are associated to their respective priorities. If an effect is picked that is not present among this map, the the controller should consider the call an input error.
        possibleEffects - Valid effects

        Parameters:

        effect2 - Second effect
